label: 被官
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: A personal follower or retainer of low rank; the personal retainers of the Ashikaga shōgun who served in low-ranking but influential positions in the Muromachi bakufu's central administration. Subordinate, bound, or servile status. (See Mass, Court and Bakufu)
